ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION: I am a software developer with more than three years of experience. I am passionate about process optimization, teamwork and learning new technologies to create efficient and scalable solutions.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: If you have any questions or want to know more about my work, do not hesitate to write to me.

WHATSAPP.TEXT_1: You can also contact me via
WHATSAPP.TEXT_3: if you prefer to communicate that way.
